page.title: 05Playground Games (cont.)
page.content: At Bedgrove First School we play a playground game called "Spaceships & Bubbles".If you are a spaceship you can zoom about going to all different planets.If you are a bubble it is very hard to steer as you only have four pretend control buttons.We also have a "rainbow machine"which we can all go in together to travel to different planets for our entertainment. Dodge ball is another game lots of children play.You need a football.You have children in a circle then you need some more children in a bigger circle outside them.The outside children have the ball and they have to throw the ball at the inside children and the children in the inside have to dodge the ball.If it touches anybody below the knee they are out and join the children on the outside.When everybody is out the outside circle goes inside.
